FeatureFlags.Name: SEASON_ID
FeatureFlags.Description: Current Season Identifier

FeatureFlags.Name: UNPAID_CASE_EXPIRES_IN_HRS
FeatureFlags.Description: Duration (in Hrs) after which an unpaid case must be expired

FeatureFlags.Name: MIDUS_REQUEST_EMAIL_RESEND_WAIT_PERIOD_IN_MINUTES
FeatureFlags.Description: Duration (in mins) for which the applicant must wait before resending email to midus entity

FeatureFlags.Name: MIDUS_REQUEST_EMAIL_RESEND_LIMBO_WAIT_PERIOD_IN_MINUTES
FeatureFlags.Description: Duration (in mins) for which the applicant must wait before resending email to midus entity, in case of no response from SendGrid

FeatureFlags.Name: UI_CONFIG_VERSION
FeatureFlags.Description: Current UI Config Version

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_SYSTEM_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Message to be displayed during the maintenance on Applicant Portal
FeatureFlags.Value:
ERAS Fellowship Documents Office Portal Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##
Due to scheduled maintenance, the ERAS Fellowship Documents Office Portal is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_IMPENDING_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Message to be displayed when the maintenance is impending on Applicant Portal
FeatureFlags.Value: ERAS Fellowship Documents Office Portal Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##. Due to scheduled maintenance, the ERAS Fellowship Documents Office Portal is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_IMPENDING_TIMESTAMP_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the impending message should begin to be displayed on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_START_TIMESTAMP_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the maintenance is going to begin on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_END_TIMESTAMP_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the maintenance is going to end on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_UPCOMING_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to indicate if a maintenance activity is coming up on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: SEASON_CLOSING_SOON_MSG_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to let users know that season is closing soon
FeatureFlags.Value: IMPORTANT NOTE: ERAS 2025 Tokens will be available for purchase on June 06, 2024. If you are planning to apply in the upcoming July Cycle, please return to this site at that time. If you purchase an ERAS 2024 Token, it will expire on May 31, 2024 and your application information and documents will be purged on that date. Tokens are non-transferrable and non-refundable.

FeatureFlags.Name: SEASON_CLOSING_SOON_TIMESTAMP_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to let users know that season is closing soon

FeatureFlags.Name: SEASON_CLOSED_MSG_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to let the user know that the season is closed
FeatureFlags.Value: The ERAS Fellowships 2025 application season is now closed. Tokens for the ERAS Fellowships 2025 application season will be available on Wednesday, June 06, 2024. Please return to the site at that time.

FeatureFlags.Name: SEASON_CLOSED_START_TIMESTAMP_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to check the start timestamp

FeatureFlags.Name: SEASON_CLOSED_END_TIMESTAMP_APPLICANTPORTAL
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to check the end timestamp
